body.name: Cleanomic Earthfresh Fabric Softener Sheets Dryer Sheets, Softens & Removes Static Cling, Vegan Laundry Softener With Essential Oils -Fragrance Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 48 mins
features: Our Cleanomic Earthfresh Dryer Sheets are safe and wax-free, so they help to protect both your skin and your clothes

Each fabric softener sheet is pre-treated in powerful but gentle fabriccare ingredients, promoting even conditioning that works to reduce static cling, smooth out wrinkles, and leave clothes super soft
Cleanomic dryer laundry sheet formula is 100% fragrance-free, so it’s great for those who are sensitive to fragrances or simply prefer fresh, aroma-free laundry dryer

Unlike many other dryer sheets, Earthfresh is made with compostable* materials that can break down into organic soil when composted. (Commercial compostable only. Facilities may not be available in your area)
Cleanomic laundry dryer sheet fragrance-free formula is good for those who are sensitive to fragrances

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softens the clothes
reviews.reviewText: Works great! No obnoxious perfume to make me sick. Plus, there isn't any static.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work and are truly unscented
reviews.reviewText: After switching to dryer balls, I was on the look out for another sustainable option for the dryer to keep towels & sheets nice and soft. These do the job! As suggested on the box larger loads require more than one sheet, especially for towels and flannel sheets. I can’t do strong scents. These are perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Dryer Sheets
reviews.reviewText: Such a wonderful product! Clothes are soft and static free! Easy to use !! The box is small and compact! Price is right too! Here’s the best part! I am doing a lot right here using this product to help save our environment! No more hauling a hug plastic jug of fabric softener!! One less plastic jug -single use —floating in our oceans and water ways ! Google The Great Pacific Garbage Patch and you will immediately see the benefits of this great new product! We must change our ways and products like this help to reduce waste which more than likely will and up in one of the many such garbage dumps floating in our oceans and lakes and waterways! Give this a go! You’ll be so pleased with your results and you will feel proud that you have helped to terminate our careless addiction to single use practices plastics!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Earthfresh dryer sheets
reviews.reviewText: These are great dryer sheets, they make your clothes, nice and soft and no static. The only thing I don’t like about them is that they stick to your clothes and sometimes you just have to find which piece of clothes they stuck to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They work, but....
reviews.reviewText: These are great, but the sheets stick to each other and clumped together. Takes a while to try to pull out just one sheet and end up pulling out 3 or 4. Going to try another brand.
